page.title: 16HOLIDAYS
page.content: We interviewed a family from London who are staying for a week in{Brook. They said that they had come to the {Isle of Wight}for a peaceful country holiday. They chose{Brook}for its lovely walks and countryside as well as its delightful beach. The children aged fourteen and sixteen said that they were enjoying the serenity although they find that there is nothing to do in the evening due to the poor television reception and the lack of night-life. The father,a business man,is finding the break a much welcomed one as he is able to relax and get away from the dusty,noisy city of London. His wife is enjoying the country walks although she misses the shops!
